General.Name: Great Computer
General.Description: Great Computer Corp. manufactures and sells electronic components, computers, and peripheral equipment in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and China. The company engages in the wholesale trading and retailing of information software. It also offers laser engravers, markers, and cutters; and cutting plotters, vinyl cutters, UV-curable inkjet printers, and digital finishing equipment. The company's products are used in signage, advertising, personalization, identification, gifts, promotions, apparel, and electronics industries. It offers its products through a network of distributors. Great Computer Corp. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 236, Fude 2nd Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22151
